original: Crime is at an all-time low in Liberty City.  It's the perfect time to join the Liberty City Police Department.  The LCPD has been cited by many as the number one police force in the world, especially by foreign tourists with the gall to ask a drunk angry cop for directions.  Build a career rifling through people's bags on the subway, arresting and imprisoning protestors, getting into high speed car chases, and marching in parades.
translated: 自由城的犯罪再创新低，现在正是加入自由城警察局的完美时机。LCPD被许多人称为全球首屈一指的警察部队，敢向醉醺醺的愤怒警察问路的外国游客对此深有体会。
